description: Modify data based on instructions written in plain english

properties.name: instructions
properties.description: Provide instructions on how you want to transform the data, then click 'Generate code'. Use dot notation to refer to nested fields (e.g. address.street).
properties.placeholder: Example: Merge 'firstname' and 'lastname' into a field 'details.name' and sort by 'email'

properties.name: jsCode
properties.description: Read-only. To edit this code, adjust the prompt or copy and paste it into a Code node.

properties.name: hint
properties.displayName: Click on 'Test step' to run the transformation code. Further executions will use the generated code (and not invoke AI again).
